snippet.title: BLACK BIRD 2016 Prototype Trailer (Nintendo Switch, Steam, 2018)
snippet.description:
Play BLACK BIRD on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/black-bird-switch/

Play BLACK BIRD on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/857500/BLACK_BIRD/

Black Bird is the tale of a young, neglected girl who dies and is resurrected as... the ominous Black Bird. 

Since ancient times, the kingdom has spoken of this bird as one of the fabled "great calamities". You are now this ancient calamity itself — the legendary ‘Black Bird’. 

Destroy the kingdom in a storm of bullets! What fate awaits this girl-turned-bird? 

Will you, the Black Bird, destroy the world? 

Has this lively, fun-filled kingdom already led itself down the path of destruction?

Find out in this unique operatic shooter on Nintendo Switch and Steam, from Tokyo indie developer Onion Games!

Click here to find out more about BLACK BIRD: http://oniongames.jp/blackbird/blackbird_en/index.html
Click here to find out more about Onion Games: http://oniongames.jp/
